title: 8bethub
author: 8bethub
content: In order to make it up to the community, we are running a 100% deposit bonus.Check us out https://8bethub.com/game contact support to claim the bonus.

comments.author: TwitchySeal
comments.body: Oh how nice of you.  A deposit bonus with 40x WR But you stole from Bustabit.  Shouldn't you be making it up to them?
